snippet: Members of Congress, and the White House, are undermining essential investor protections.
abstract: Editorial criticizes the House and Senate for passing the Jump-Start Our Business Start-Ups Act, which rolls back essential regulations that protect investors; urges Pres Obama to refuse to sign the bill or risk another financial crisis.
lead_paragraph: Members of Congress, and the White House, are undermining essential investor protections.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
